# Construction Payment Manager - React Native App

## Project Overview
Construction business payment management mobile app built with React Native (Expo).

## Features
- Track money In (receivable) and Out (payable)
- Contact integration for party names
- Local storage for data persistence
- Transaction history grouped by month
- Project-specific filtering
- Monthly reporting with charts
- WhatsApp reminder integration

- Constants centralized in `/src/constants/index.ts`
- All screens refactored to use constants for consistency
- SOLID principles applied throughout codebase
